body:
When my computer (Lenovo T470) wakes up from hibernation, during chain synchronization, bitcoin 0.18.0 crashes
The expected behavior is not to crash and continue the synchronization.

The bitcoin client crashes

To reproduce, you have to have a syncing client, then put you computer to hibernation, then wake it up, it will crash.

I use the 0.18.0 version installed from ubuntu repository.

My laptop is a Lenovo T470 with ubuntu 18.10

the debug.log :

title: client 0.18.0 crashes when computer wakes up from hibernation
